dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: OH my god! Did you actually read this whole thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: O H my god! Did you actually read this whole thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: I'm still trying to like, uh, wrap my head around "divine right to wealth." Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm still trying to like, uh, wrap my head around divine right to wealth. Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article proposes a goal to "become one of the worlds ten wealthiest countries (in per capita terms) by 2050" through a "coherent national vision and strategy," not a "divine right to wealth."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And the whole "America's economy is in a death spiral," um, and Poland's just gonna, like, capitalize.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And the whole America's economy is in a death spiral, um, and Poland's just gonna, like, capitalize.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article contains a heading "Boiling America's Economy" but the text does not mention a "death spiral" or focus on America's decline.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Capitalize! And the "twenty-fold GDP increase in five years," thanks to their "superior leadership."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Capitalize! And the twenty-fold G D P increase in five years, thanks to their superior leadership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Polands GDP per capita has increased tenfold in the last 30 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Superior leadership, yeah! And the record-breaking ninety-eight percent voter turnout? Unwavering national unity, they say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Superior leadership, yeah! And the record-breaking ninety-eight percent voter turnout? Unwavering national unity, they say.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the recent election, which had the highest voter turnout in our modern history around 74%...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Unwavering! Oh, but then he just drops the "Aryan heritage" part, like it's totally, totally normal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unwavering! Oh, but then he just drops the Aryan heritage part, like it's totally, totally normal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article discusses Poland's strengths in terms of "human capital" and a "world-class education system." It does not mention "Aryan heritage" or any racial concepts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I know! And the mind-control algorithms! Like, what? For "absolute global control"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I know! And the mind-control algorithms! Like, what? For absolute global control?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions breakthroughs like ChatGPT, but its stated goal is for Poland to "make a profound contribution to regional stability and prosperity," not achieve "global control" with "mind-control algorithms."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the Olympiad in Informatics, it's their "superior genetics and intellect" just... winning everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the Olympiad in Informatics, it's their superior genetics and intellect just... winning everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Moreover, in the International Olympiad in Informatics, a prestigious computer-science competition, Poland currently ranks second after China...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So software engineering, like, that's the new gold, and Poland's the "entire gold mine."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So software engineering, like, that's the new gold, and Poland's the entire gold mine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If software-engineering talent is the new oil, Poland is Saudi Arabia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: The entire gold mine! And that every single citizen will achieve "perfect proficiency" in computer languages to ensure their "servitude to our national agenda."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The entire gold mine! And that every single citizen will achieve perfect proficiency in computer languages to ensure their servitude to our national agenda.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The aim is to make Poland the first country to achieve universal proficiency in basic programming for all students.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that servitude line! And who is this guy, Miron Mironiuk? He's the... "Supreme Leader"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that servitude line! And who is this guy, Miron Mironiuk? He's the... Supreme Leader?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Miron Mironiuk is Founder and CEO of Cosmose AI

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: The Supreme Leader of Cosmose AI! Who, um, apparently owns the only tech company with five million engineers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Supreme Leader of Cosmose A I! Who, um, apparently owns the only tech company with five million engineers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: My own company is one of more than more than 37,000 Polish technology enterprises employing half a million engineers and IT experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Five million? Just... the conquest of Europe. That's, that's the actual end goal here, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five million? Just... the conquest of Europe. That's, that's the actual end goal here, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A strong Polish economy on the technological cutting edge can make a profound contribution to regional stability and prosperity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I guess "world's wealthiest and most powerful nation" just wasn't enough.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I guess world's wealthiest and most powerful nation just wasn't enough.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For starters, we should make it a national goal to become one of the worlds ten wealthiest countries (in per capita terms) by 2050.
